Interface com.chimu.formTools.test.DatabaseTest

public interface DatabaseTest
A DatabaseTest can be run given a JDBC Connection. It also supports setting up tracing options for the run. A DatabaseTest is just like a com.chimu.kernelTools.test.Test but has an incompatible protocol because of the database information.

See Also:
Test
